author: elliottdehn
content: Hi everyone, I'm sure this is asked a lot but do we have any idea when the first iteration of sharding will be merged? Online it says Q4 this year but I doubt that heavily.

author: elliottdehn
content: Is it expected to impact the tps of mainlined Ethereum transactions?

author: elliottdehn
content:
I see that it's adding blob space for temporary storage of call-data and wondering if this is what accounts for all the gain.

I love Ethereum the technology but I fell off the bandwagon due to 13 tps being way too slow. Glad to see it's being addressed finally.
